document.full_text: in south-central tennessee on tuesday, volkswagen ag marks the grand opening of a $1 billion assembly plant that looms large in the german automaker's plan to unseat toyota motor co as the world's largest automaker.
document.title: volkswagen sees u.s. plant as key to unseating toyota
lines_and_colors: in south-central tennessee on tuesday, volkswagen ag marks the grand opening of a $1 billion assembly plant that looms large in the german automaker's plan to unseat toyota motor co as the world's largest automaker.
